answers.answer: I don't have kids with the same birthday.  But my daughter does share a birthday with her uncle, which is the day after her grandpa's (my dad).

My first 2 were both conceived on the 4th of July, 5 years apart and were both due on March 24. They were both early because of eclampsia and preeclampsia so one is early Feb and the other is early March. I have considered combined birthday parties on birthdays that are odd or ordinary ages...like on my daughter's 13th birthday I wouldn't ask her to share but for like when he turns 7 and she 12 I'd ask them to share a party. They don't mind...
My brothers girlfriend has four kids two born on Feb 22 and two born on Nov 2
Not the exact same but April 30 2013 & may 1 2014
My two are close April 19th and may 2nd. Expecting #3 in July!
i am due augus 19 and my sons birthday on that same day he will be 9 years
my sons birthday is july 20 an my second one is due july 27 .
My kids bdays are 12,29,30 of October
O wow I thought I had it close with same days....
My birthday Aug 15 my oldest daughter is Aug 8 which is 13 and my Baby girl is Aug 1 she is 1 our birthday fall on the same day every year but different week

Mine is Oct 12, brother's is Oct 19th... my sister's is Nov 18th and my Dad's is Nov 19th, nephew's is Dec 19th and mom's is Dec 23rd. My dad was born in '50, my brother in '70 and my sister in '80. Lol

I share a birthday with my daughter (Dec.13). 7 years later, I am now pregnant again and my due date is Dec.11. How ironic!! December is going to be 1 heck of a month for me (Me and the kids' birthdays, Christmas, and my Anniversary.) Talk about a 'hole in the pockets'.

I'm currently 30 weeks with my second daughter and her due date is two days before my daughters 5th birthday. So could be on the same day. My daughter is very excited and tells everyone she's having a sissy for her birthday.
Lol my bday is Sep 15th. & my due date is Sep 3rd.

My due date is your birthday! lol.I read on another post you lost a little one in September last yr and are due in September as well.Same story here, I found out I lost him at 16wks and had him a week later on September 12th and am due September 15th with this baby.Looks like our little ones are trying to make a second appearance or something.that's the way I look at it :)

I conceived both my sons the exact day 4years later.. Same due date July 21st.. My older son came on the 18th. I have a scheduled c section this time, we opted out on them having the same birthday, we decided 2-3 days before his birthday:)

My boys don't share the same date but we're all in November. My oldest was born 11.05.05, my bday is 11.07, nd my youngest is 11.11.11. I'm so thankful this baby is due in May bc November is hectic trying to plan one big party bc of their age gap and then pulling off Christmas right after is literally a miracle. Best of luck to you in December!

My boys are may June and July they get a small party on their day then we have a big bash together. The family can't make it to a birthday party a month so this works out great for us. The bun in the oven is due in Sept so she is the wacky one lol.
My first and second were both due on the 16th (Feb and sept) they both arrived 3 days later. I'm due on May 16th and am crossing my fingers that this one will be 3 days late as well!

question: Hello nice to meet everyone.I found out I'm 4wks with number three and my first two children are 9 and 12 same birthdays Dec.6th  three years apart. Now if I did my calculations correctly my due date with this one is Dec 15.Now I promise nothing was planned but very instresting one party takes place.Has anyone else experienced same bdays with    lil ones?
title: same birthdays
